RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 2, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 2, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5 ,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPHEROID outrun in the early going while three wide through the first turn, moved out, fanned six wide into the lane, challenged while widest nearing the furlong grounds, gained the advantage then held the runner up safe in the final strides. HELLUVA LIFE broke back, lacked speed while off the inside, angled out to be five wide and inside the winner turning for home, saw his progress stall a bit past the furlong marker, launched a late surge to be closing the gap rapidly on the winner in the late going. GETCHA within striking distance from the start, advanced and challenged three wide far turn, put a head in front soon after, continued to hold the advantage upper stretch, offered brief resistance to the winner nearing midstretch then could not keep up with that one nor contain the runner up, saved the show. CHEROKEE TAKEOVER dropped inside for room midway up the backstretch, moved back out for room second turn, encountered further traffic in upper stretch, came out slightly for room as OUTLAW X. was steering in past the furlong marker, came into brief contact with that one and finished up evenly. OUTLAW X. in the second flight off the inside, moved a bit closer before a half, continued in a forward position second turn, four wide and inside the top two exiting that bend, was going evenly when in traffic approaching midstretch, came in slightly, brushed with CHEROKEE TAKEOVER and also finished up one paced. HONOR MY SPEED broke alertly, raced with the lead pack into the first turn while widest in the five path, cleared onto the backstretch while working way toward the inside, set the pace into the far turn, began to weaken when headed midway on that bend. VIM AND VIGOR four wide in the first turn, raced in mid pack up the backstretch, began to weaken after four furlongs. LATE NITE MISCHIEF in the main body early, was finished after five furlongs. GREELEY'S DEALER fell back after the start to trail and showed little. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE STRETCH RUN, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Helluva Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, angled 5w into lane, late surge,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Late Nite Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body, finished after five furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Getcha
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, bid, led 3w 2nd, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Outlaw X.
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight early, traffic, brush 1/8, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Cherokee Takeover
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside backstretch,traffic 1/8, moved out, minor gain

ENTRY.NAME: Spheroid
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early 3w, steered out, 6w into lane, bid, took over, held

ENTRY.NAME: Vim and Vigor
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w first turn, weakened after half

ENTRY.NAME: Honor My Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, 5w 7/8, cleared, pace, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Greeley's Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, showed little

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 78. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 2, 2023 A llowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since April 2, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANGEL OF VERDUN angled in entering the first turn to save some ground, settled in the run up the backstretch, made a solid move three wide into contention second bend, bid midstretch, kicked well clear. LAST OF THE NILE lacked early foot toward the inside, continued to be outrun second turn, came three to four wide into the straight, rallied to be up late for the place, not a serious threat to the winner. CAVE CREEK floated out when prompting the pace first turn, continued to race within striking distance, fell back a bit second bend, dropped inside nearing midstretch, gained the nod for the show while not kicking on to annex the second spot. BROKEN PROPOSAL broke on top, got out into the first turn when showing the way, clear before a quarter, pace middle half, offered little resistance to the winner when confronted for the drive, gave ground grudgingly in contending for the runner up position. CASHEW last away, raced back, came five wide for the drive, lacking a closing response. COINMAKER carried out to be widest through the first turn, chased the leader the middle half then gave way for the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Broken Proposal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top,got out 1st pace, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Cashew
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, back, 5w into stretch, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Last of the Nile
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 3-4w into lane, rallied, up late 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Cave Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: floated out 1st turn,within striking distance,movd inside,nod 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Coinmaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: floated out 1st turn, chased, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Angel of Verdun
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Stephen J and Peterson Konnor
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in 1st turn, strong move 3w 2nd, bid, kicked clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG ACE with the pace from the start, vied three wide into the turn, shook clear of the other speed by late in the bend, not threatened to the wire under a steady right then left handed crop. LET'S GO RANDOM bumped at the break to be last away, lacked speed despite being asked for some run into the turn, saved ground through the bend, second best while remaining along the inside for the drive. SILVER CHALICE bumped with the runner up at the break to be tardy away as well, also lacked speed, five wide into the lane, rallied to be up for the show late. BRADSTREET in mid pack off the inside, raced three wide through the turn, lacked a closing punch. DOUBLE BOGEY outrun in the early going outside, ranged up closer in the four path turning for home, flattened out in the final furlong. SMOOTH RIVER fell back to trail after the start, was six wide when under encouragement out of the turn, failed to produce a meaningful rally. MOURVEDRE with the early pace between foes, continued to vie early in the turn, was beginning to weaken late in the bend when put in tight, checked up and continued to give way. KIT KAT KIDD with the leaders closest to the inside up the backstretch, was still contesting the issue when getting out late in the turn putting MOURVEDRE in tight late in the bend, stopped through the stretch. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE RUN THROUGH LATE TURN, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Kit Kat Kidd
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace inside, got out late turn, stopped stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mourvedre
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied btwn foes, weakening when checked in tight 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth River
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 6w into lane, little in the way of a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Big Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace 3w, shook clear late turn, not threatened drive

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Chalice
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, well back, 5w into lane, up for the show

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go Random
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, lacked speed, saved ground turn, 2nd best up rail

ENTRY.NAME: Bradstreet
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3w turn, lacked closing punch

ENTRY.NAME: Double Bogey
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, closer 4w late turn, flattened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 2, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHROME BABY unhurried early along the inside, moved closer before a half toward the inside, idled along second turn, steered out four wide for the drive, engaged the leader inside the furlong marker, wore that foe down while drifting in a bit late floating that same rival toward the inside. MACHINE GUN MAN within striking distance off the inside, challenged outside the two leaders far turn, took command into the lane, responded when challenged by the winner with less than a furlong remaining and proved stubborn to the end while being floated in. DRILLING REPORT closest to the early leader, advanced and challenged between horses and inside the runner up second turn, proved no match for the top two the final furlong, clear of the others. EYE DEE KAY back off the pace, moved out bit, four wide second turn, lacked needed closing response. HYPERBOLIST fell back to trail, came five wide turning into the stretch, went evenly to the wire in lacking a serious kick as well. DREWHUSTLE rank at the start, cleared into the first turn, set the pace until confronted in the second turn, gave way when headed.

ENTRY.NAME: Chrome Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early inside, closer before 1/2,steered out, bid, drift

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Taylor Brothers Properties LLC, GeorgeE. Saufley, et al

ENTRY.NAME: Drewhustle
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank start, cleared, pace, gave way when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Drilling Report
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, bid btwn foes 2nd, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Eye Dee Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 4w 2nd turn, lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Machine Gun Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, bid 3-4w into lane, took over, stubborn

ENTRY.NAME: Hyperbolist
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 5w into lane, evenly drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ADIEU ACES last away, used four wide to rapidly advance into a forward position by early in the turn, dueled into the stretch while still out in the strip, pulled away the final furlong under steady handling. EASY CHANCE away in good order, dueled early outside, second duel inside the winner exiting the turn, could not match strides with that one the final furlong, clearly second best. CORN SOUP in mid pack while well off the inside, came five wide for the drive, rallied past the furlong marker to reach closest to the top two a furlong out, proved no match for that pair, narrowly saved the show late. JACKIE MOON lacked early foot off the inside, three to four wide exiting the turn, finished willingly to be gaining for the show. CALLEN FEELS GOOD went one paced three wide most of the way, lacked a serious late kick. SWIFT N TRAFFIC broke back, lacked speed, five wide out of the turn, picked off a couple of rivals to improve position, no real threat. CATINANDSCATIN also broke well behind the leaders, continued to lag for three furlongs, five wide out of the turn, showed some belated interest to better his position. ETBAUER'S SECRET void of speed for a half, passed tiring rivals while not posing a threat. BERNIE SPECIAL broke alertly, fell back into the main body, tired through the stretch along the inside. LAST NATIVE CAT in the second flight for three furlongs, had little left for the stretch run. THA ILLEST DEAL moved up to duel inside the runner up for the opening quarter, began to give way before three furlongs. COTTONCLUB SOLDIER was finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Cottonclub Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Catinandscatin
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, void of speed, 5w into lane, belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 3-4w exiting turn, gaining 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Last Native Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, had little left for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Bernie Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, fell back, tired inside

ENTRY.NAME: Tha Illest Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to duel, gave way in the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Corn Soup
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off the inside, asked 5w into lane, rallied,held show

ENTRY.NAME: Etbauer's Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Callen Feels Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced three wide, lacked late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Swift N Traffic
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, 5w into lane, improved, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Chance
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, vied, dueled, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Adieu Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, used 4w into turn, dueled, pulled away late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 95. Claiming Purse 23000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES AT A MILE OR OVER ON THE TURF IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since May 2, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REAL CITY SPEED broke out, straightened, dueled up front along the inside, rated in the run up the backstretch while narrowly showing the way, continued to hold a small advantage far turn, extended that lead when straightened for home, roused, held that same rival save late under firm handling. G VICTORY broke inward but on top, relinquished the advantage to the winner into the first turn, pressed that one the two path onto the backstretch, dueled the next three furlongs, chased that foe into the lane, could not get back to that one while edging away for the second spot. SNIVELING in mid pack for five furlongs along the inside, moved closer while continuing to save ground through the second bend while moving closest to the top two, made a bid for the runner up spot with a furlong to run, outkicked, clear of the others. JACI'S ROYALTY in the second flight early, continued in the second group while between foes and a bit rank through the second bend, went evenly through the lane in lacking a closing response. UNFATHOMED went one paced throughout while racing off the inside. BLUERIDGE MOUNTAIN off a step slow, raced back, improved a bit while not posing a serious threat. MINNESOTA MIRACLE bothered at the start, failed to menace. CHAOSMOS broke out, bothered rival, moved up a forward position after being righted, gave way after a half. MAGEEZ fell back to trail after the start and was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Jaci's Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, bit rank btwn foes 2nd turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Real City Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, rated, shook clear, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Blueridge Mountain
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, back, improved, not dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: G Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pressed 2p, dueled middle half, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Unfathomed
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout off the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Sniveling
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, closer, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Chaosmos
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bothered foe, moved up forward, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Minnesota Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered start, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Mageez
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VODKA MARTINI broke with the leaders, took control soon after, disposed of the other speed exiting the turn, drew off steadily through the lane under a moderate hand ride to win ridden out. GROSSE TETE IAN lacked any early foot, began to rally through traffic turning for home, finished willingly to annex the place, no match for the winner. TWOFEXUSNEXUS away in good order inside, moved a bit closer in the second flight just off the inside late in the turn, three wide for the drive, chased the winner in vain past the furlong marker, caught late for the runner up position. LOOKIN AT BETTY broke back, devoid of speed for almost a half, steered out widest exiting the turn, finished well to improve position, too late to make an impact on the top three. MONOLITH fractious prestart, broke back, lacked speed outside, five wide into the lane, also improved position with some late interest well out in the strip. PARTY LITTLE BOY in the second flight through the turn, had little for the drive to come up empty. KNOT THE ONE broke well, dueled outside the winner for almost a half and gave way. PRINCE COSMO one paced off rail. COLE'S SENSATION last away,lagged well back for four furlongs, picked off some tiring rivals well after the issue had been decided. MECKES PRIORITY was never a threat. A FOOL FOR CARLOS forwardly placed for a half, stopped in the drive. TOAST TO THE GIRLS was finished before a half in giving way midway on the, far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Twofexusnexus
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, bit closer late turn, 3w into lane, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Toast to the Girls
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, far back

ENTRY.NAME: Cole's Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lagged well back, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Meckes Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Lookin At Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, void of speed, steered widest drive,stride late

ENTRY.NAME: Vodka Martini
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with leaders, took control, drew off stretch, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Party Little Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight turn, little for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Grosse Tete Ian
ENTRY.OWNER: 5G Farms LLC and McBride Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, rallied thru traffic, willing 2nd,no match winner

ENTRY.NAME: Prince Cosmo
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Knot the One
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, dueled outside winner, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Monolith
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious prestart, lacked speed, 5w 1/4, improved

ENTRY.NAME: A Fool for Carlos
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward for a half, stopped stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Allowed 3 lb s. Claiming Price $50,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLESSED ASSURANCE unhurried for a half while three wide, called on for some run into the lane, reeled in the leader past the furlong marker, drew well clear under steady handling. NODAH pressed the issue up the backstretch from the three path, challenged on the outside turn, showed the way into the stretch, proved no match for the winner late, clear of the rest. BANDIT'S PRIDE fell back to trail after the start, continued to lag far turn, angled out four wide for the drive, rallied to the clear for the show. TRANQUILLA went one paced toward the rail in lacking a closing response. LUMINOUS FLIGHT broke alertly, showed the way up the backstretch, steadily weakened through the lane. CUSTOM DESIGN pressed the issue up the backstretch off the inside, gave way from between horses turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Luminous Flight
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, early pace inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bandit's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, angled 4w into the lane, rallied show

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Design
ENTRY.COMMENT: briefly with pace btwn foes, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Tranquilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, lacked closing bid

ENTRY.NAME: Blessed Assurance
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried for a half, 3w into lane, reeled in leader, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Nodah
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3w, bid, took over late turn, no match late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5F Dirt CR: 41. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRIFTING MELODIES bumped start, asked to keep up out of the gate, vied three wide into the lane, put a head in front before three furlongs, shook clear when straightened for home then held the runner up safe under steady handling. SHOOTING STICK in mid pack early, slipped through along the rail to improve inside of rivals late in the turn, chased the winner past the furlong, could do little with that one late, clearly second best. A. P. STYLE in mid pack, improved through some traffic, just up for the show late. SHE'S THE SHERIFF broke a bit slowly, raced back early as a result, three wide into the lane, slight bother, moved outside of some traffic a furlong out, displayed some late interest to narrowly miss the show. SUNSET FLASH broke back,devoid of speed for a half, swung five wide out of the turn, finished willingly while too late. TERRI GOT A FRIEND broke out, was straightened to race in the second flight outside, four wide through the turn, lacked a closing kick. OCEAN FLEET broke in good order, vied up front along the inside early, gave way into the stretch. NIKLAUSIA fell back after the start and did not menace. AMELIES DREAMER bumped with the winner at the break, forwardly placed up the backstretch outside, vied four wide into the turn, tired through the stretch. SWEET SASSICAIA off a step slow, lacked speed outside, four wide turn, remained back. CAT HAIR FLYING flashed brief early foot between foes, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Niklausia
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, void of speed, swung 5w into lane, stride late

ENTRY.NAME: Shooting Stick
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, slipped thru along the rail, late turn, chased,2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Ocean Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front along the inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Cat Hair Flying
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed btwn, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: She's the Sheriff
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke bit slow, three wide into the lane, traffic 1/8 missed show

ENTRY.NAME: A. P. Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, improved improved, just up show

ENTRY.NAME: Drifting Melodies
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump brk asked, vied 3w into turn, shook clear, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Amelies Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, forwardly placed, vied 4w into turn, tired stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Sassicaia
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, 4w, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Terri Got a Friend
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, 2nd flight, 4w into the lane, lacked kick
